definition: figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
soldiers/a force/an army/weapons/arms/military/warlike/CL:個|个[ge4]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
wooden figures buried with the dead

sentences.english: Tomorrow,  I look for forward to seeing the Terra Cotta Warriors and the Old City walls.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着明天參觀兵馬俑和古城牆。

sentences.english: People always connect Xi'an with the Big Goose Pagoda and Terracotta Warriors and Horses.
sentences.chinese: 人們一提到西安就會聯想到大雁塔和兵馬俑。

sentences.english: I want to see the Terra Cotta Warriors and the mountains of Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 我想去看看兵馬俑和陽朔的山。

sentences.english: These terracotta warriors have guarded the Qin Shinghuang Tomb for over 2,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 這些兵馬俑已經守衛秦始皇陵兩千多年了。

sentences.english: British people get the chance to view the Terracotta Army without travelling to China.
sentences.chinese: 英國人最近不用去中國就能看到中國的兵馬俑了。

sentences.english: Lintong farmers found the Terracotta Warriors in Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 陝西臨潼農民發現秦始皇兵馬俑。

sentences.english: This is a real archeological treasure trove with its terra - cotta and horses.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個真正的考古寶庫與地面兵馬俑。

sentences.english: The museum of the Terracotta Army is located in Xi'An, Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 兵馬俑博物館坐落於陝西省西安市。

sentences.english: Tomorrow, I look forward to seeing the Terra Cotta Warriors and the Old City walls.
sentences.chinese: 明天，我將回去參觀秦始皇兵馬俑和古長城。

sentences.english: Great Wall, terracotta warriors and horses of the Yellow River, Kyushu brilliant mind Shu.
sentences.chinese: 長城黃河兵馬俑，九州絢麗心意舒。

sentences.english: Where is the Mausoleum of the First Qin Emperor?
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇陵兵馬俑在哪裏？

sentences.english: I really want to see the old walls and terra-cotta warriors one day.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想有一天去看看古代的牆和兵馬俑。

sentences.english: Wooden attendants stood watch in a Zhou king's tomb in Liangdai centuries before the terra cotta army was created.
sentences.chinese: 周朝帝王墓穴中出土的木傭，比兵馬俑早了幾個世紀。

sentences.english: These terra cotta warriors are very life-like.
sentences.chinese: 秦兵馬俑是非常寫實的。

sentences.english: I could see the Terra-Cotta Warriors.
sentences.chinese: 我應該去看看秦始皇兵馬俑。

sentences.english: This museum, housing terra-cotta warriors and horses, is the largest one of this kind in China today.
sentences.chinese: 這個兵馬俑博物館是當今中國同類中最大的一個。

definition: ruins/historic relics
historical remains/historic monuments
mural (painting)/fresco
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
historical museum
Jiayu Pass in Gansu, at the western terminus of the Great Wall/Jiayuguan prefecture-level city in Gansu
trace/vestige/historical remains/remnant
museum
to rob a tomb
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
Baoji prefecture-level city in Shaanxi/called Chencang 陳倉|陈仓[Chen2 cang1] in ancient times
the Louvre, museum in Paris
scenic spot/place of interest (tourism)
Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
mythological animal
